title: Getting Started with Bringing Your Brand to VR Through 360
excerpt: At The Soap Collective, we help brands strategize how they can best use virtual reality to better connect with their customers. Throughout 2016, we found one of the best ways a company can get started in VR, and reach customers, is through a 360 video mobile app.

title: Highlights from VR Film Meetup’s “Storytelling in VR” panel at Upload Collective
excerpt: An amazing panel of storytellers discussed their latest projects, and shared the lessons they’ve learned in creating narrative driven VR experiences. The panel was comprised of Maureen Fan, Colum Slevin, Cassidy Curtis, Scott Hutchins, Ben Peck, and was moderated by Rodes Fishburne.

title: Building Inclusive VR Experiences
excerpt: There are many variables that go into designing and developing for inclusivity that need to be considered: the size of the team, production schedule, budget, what the experience is, and who the target audience is, just to name a few.

title: Notes from introducing hundreds of people to VR in just a few days
excerpt: After introducing virtual reality to hundreds of attendees at the IMPACT 2016 conference, I've compiled notes and lessons on people’s reactions.
